title: Could Do Better: More of the Very Worst Howlers by Schoolchildren.
description: More side-splitting errors from schoolchildren in this sequel to the bestselling Must Try Harder .Norman McGreevy's illustrated selection of schoolchildren's struggles with the pitfalls of the English language ranges from hilarious howlers on topics like history and religion to ridiculous spelling errors, grammatical catastrophes and malapropisms.
author: Norman McGreevy
